KitKat::

She looked puzzled as she followed Perceptor. "Who? Galvatron and 
megatron?"  Her memery chip sparked an old scene from a battle. Her 
and Megatgron fought. But he won and she took her place as a 
subordinate to him.  She shook her head as she returned to the hear 
and now.  "Well, I am not sure who that is, but if he will conquer 
over our enemies, then I will follow."



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000 <airly2002@h...>" 
<airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Perceptor:
> 
> "He's Galvatron and Megatron merged... both in one"replied the male
>
